title: Interaction Structuring Strategies to Enhance Social Presence in Online Science Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science Knowledge and Experience in Using Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Focus on the impact of social presence on learning outcomes in VR simulation environments for enhancing science-related job competencies

learning_goals: Learners can engage in meaningful interactions with peers and instructors at least three times per week through VR-based collaborative tasks
Learners can express emotional responses at least twice weekly using digital communication tools (emoticons, voice chat, etc.)
Based on pre-course education on online learning rules, learners can achieve over 80% platform functionality proficiency by the first week of the course
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
